sense.def:
Z besedo
proper
opisujemo stvari, ki se nam zdijo resnične in zadovoljive.

seg.quote: He's never had a proper job.
Lack of proper funding is making our job more difficult.

sense.def:
Stvar, ki je
proper
, je pravilna ali najprimernejša.

seg.quote: Everything was in its proper place.
What's the proper word for those things?

sense.def:
Besedo
proper
lahko pristavimo drugi besedi, ki se nanaša na poimenovanje nekega kraja, kadar želimo poudariti, da imamo v mislih glavni ali osrednji del tistega kraja.

seg.quote: By the time I got to the village proper everyone was out to meet me.
